pullRequest.title: Update go protocol buffers to v2.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Updates Go SDK protos to use v2 of the Go protocol buffer package. This is largely behind the protos existing interfaces, and so is transparent to the SDK's use of them.
The proto option go_packages were updated to the fully qualified import names, as the usage we had was being deprecated soon. This lead to some changes to the go generate script that creates the pb.go files. We still require that the beam repo be ensconced in a github/apache folder in a developer's Go path, for proper Go SDK development, but this should be easier to handle if there are other small proto changes needed.
Handles renaming the MonitoringInfos rpc from #13078 which required small updates to harness/harness.go, this PR will be force updated once that one is in.

Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.
